title: Fireside with the Underboss - "He Killed Her And Put Her In The Bathtub"
description: Sammy talks about Tommy "Karate" Pitera and just how obsessed he was with being a hitman. He was so vicious, in fact, that he even had the drive to go after a woman.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy talks about Tommy "Karate" Pitera and just how obsessed he was with being a hitman. He was so vicious, in fact, that he even had the drive to go after a woman.
